name: Unit 751
description:
A 2D Puzzle Platform Shooter. Unit 751 features over 30 unique levels that each bring a different set of challenges through the use of multiple puzzle elements that are introduced throughout the game.

Link to intro trailer on Youtube

This game was developed in my free time over the course of a few weeks as a learning project and an example of my work. It is a compressed applications zip for windows computers. Steam Workshop Link available here.

Created by Eddie Stanton
